skills.name: Install Cypress
Configuration
Basic Test
Selectors
skills.pattern:
cy.get('.class');                    // CSS selector
cy.get('#id');                       // ID
cy.get('[data-cy=submit]');          // Data attribute
cy.contains('Text');                 // By text
cy.get('button').contains('Submit'); // Chained
cy.get('input[name=email]');         // Attribute

skills.name: Actions
Assertions
Chaining
skills.pattern:
cy.get('form')
  .find('input[name=email]')
  .type('test@example.com')
  .should('have.value', 'test@example.com');

cy.get('.list')
  .children()
  .first()
  .should('contain', 'Item 1');

skills.name: Aliases
Network Interception
Waiting
Fixtures
Custom Commands
Hooks
Viewport
Cookies/Storage
File Upload
Iframes
Shadow DOM
Environment Variables
Retries
Screenshots
Video Recording
skills.pattern:
// cypress.config.ts
video: true,
videosFolder: 'cypress/videos',
videoCompression: 32,
videoUploadOnPasses: false

skills.name: Component Testing
Tasks
Plugins
TypeScript
Parallel Testing
skills.pattern:
# With Cypress Cloud
cypress run --record --parallel

# With sorry-cypress (self-hosted)
cypress run --parallel --ci-build-id $BUILD_ID

skills.name: CI Integration
skills.pattern:
# .github/workflows/cypress.yml
name: Cypress Tests
on: push
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: cypress-io/github-action@v5
        with:
          build: npm run build
          start: npm start
          wait-on: 'http://localhost:3000'

skills.name: Debugging
Best Practices
